title: The Risks and Rewards for Amazon's HQ2
description:
Amazon has made it official. It has awarded its two new headquarters to New York City and Arlington, Virginia. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg Opinion columnist Shira Ovide on why Amazon picked these cities and the risks it took making the process so public. 
FOLLOW UP
 Shira's latest column: Amazon May Have Outsmarted Itself With HQ2 Tactics
You can follow Shira at: @ShiraOvide 
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
